name: mmmm1348 (DEMO)
description:
This game is the most game ever of all time! 10/10 - Jesus of Nazareth

have yuo ever wanted 2 play game that is so epic..... so awesome.... mmmm1348 is the game you need in your life! play this game to instantly receive 10 worms in your mailbox at exactly 10:30 pm pdt

MAKE FRIENDS!1!!

you play as a worm named xochitl and you can make friends with the residents inside and outside of the weird house you live in.

DO STUFF!!!!!!!

you can meet peabo bryson.

DECODE!

the tool residents speak in a cryptic code........ xochitl speaks in base64 (you really Do Not need to translate anything not in english bc it is not necessary to progress the game further)
